form.pron: Wu gu gan wu gu gan gan-

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu gu 無辜 , wu gu . Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 86: 夫小兒無辜疳者，其 候：面黃髮直，時時壯熱，飲食不生肌膚，積經日月，遂致死者 , “Now, when children have wu gu with gan -illness the signs are as follows: the facial complexion is yellow, the hair stands up straight, they repeatedly develop strong heat, beverages and food fail to generate muscles and flesh. Eventually this will end in death”.
